title: Large clock drift on Pixel 3 XL
content:
I noticed that my two phones have different times. The Pixel XL is keeping the correct time, but the Pixel 3 drifts. Right now it's over 2 minutes off from the correct time (running fast). 

After a reset, the time is in sync but then it begins to drift over the next few days.

https://photos.app.goo.gl/ae8PdrSCmmYfURBY7

Both phones are on T-Mobile.

Not sure if it's related to any battery-saving feature which is enabled on only the Pixel 3.

Any thoughts on the reason?
